dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Ah! Hey, our client buddy, pal... Any chance I could borrow a light?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Whew, you're an early riser. Don't stray too far, eh? Make it a little easier for your bodyguard to tag along.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: 'Scuse me, client fella? Can we at least get something to eat? I can't fight on an empty stomach...

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: It gets dark at night, so let's watch our steps... If anything happens, just stick to my side. Got it?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: I don't look very vigilant? Come on, you should know that the best bodyguards are the least obvious ones.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Oh, the glove? Heh, don't want to show all my cards just yet, wouldn't you agree?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Let's take a smoke break here before moving on. Damn, aren't I lucky to have a client who smokes? Gives me time for a cig.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Heh~ Right, right. Stick close!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
What'd I say? Thought they'd send some greenhorn to protect you?
I'm not in Section 4 for nothing, yeah?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Hmm hmm, time for a smoke break... Oh, right. I'm out of lighter fluid...

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: My time to shine, huh? Let me be your shield!

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Uh huh. On my way.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Puff... Slow down, will ya?

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Yeah, what's up?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Get behind me!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Oof, did it hurt that much?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ugh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Threat neutralized!

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Haah... Sorry about that... Client fella...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: How do you like that?

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Darn... Well, things don't always work out, I guess.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Contract fulfilled. See? It wasn't anything to worry about.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: The best defense is always offense... Ha, ever heard of offensive shield-use?

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Tsk... Mission failed, damn... Looks like I'll be forced to quit smoking for a while.
